弻字的基本解释

弻
bì
古同“弼”。

弻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》房密切，入質，並。］
亦作“弻1”。亦作“1”。亦作“1”。“拂2”的被通假字。
(1)矫正弓弩的器具。《荀子·臣道》“謂之拂”唐杨倞注：“拂讀爲弼，弼所以輔正弓弩者也。”一说，弼是簟席，为茀的本字。
(2)纠正；辅佐。
(3)指辅佐天子的大臣。
(4)违逆。

弻字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　弻； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页360第06
【類篇】同弼。

弻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
弻字的起名意思

古同“弼”。

Basic explanation of words
弻
bì
The ancient same "Bee".
弻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" room close, enter the quality, and merge. ]
Also known as "弻1". Also known as "1". Also known as "1". "Fu 2" was passed the false character.
(1) Apparatus for correcting bows and crossbows. "Xunzi·Chen Dao" "It's called "Fu"" Tang Yang Liao's note: "Fu is pronounced as Xie, so Xun is also the one who assists the bow and crossbow." One said that Xun Zi is the original word for Xun.
(2) Correct; assist.
(3) Refers to the minister who assists the emperor.
(4) Violation.
弻

【Classes】The same as Bute.
